languages.text: "И это приводит нас к главной проблеме... Футфол — ремонтная верфь и место торговли, сами мы почти ничего не производим и сильно зависим от внешних поставок. Особенно — поставок продовольствия. Станция, разумеется, имеет запасы, но проблемы с маршрутами начались не вчера. Футфол будет признателен, если династия фон Валанциус окажет нам помощь и заключит договор на поставку продовольствия".

traits.locale_text: "И это приводит нас к главной проблеме... Футфол — ремонтная верфь и место торговли, сами мы почти ничего не производим и сильно зависим от внешних поставок. Особенно — поставок продовольствия. Станция, разумеется, имеет запасы, но проблемы с маршрутами начались не вчера. Футфол будет признателен, если династия фон Валанциус окажет нам помощь и заключит договор на поставку продовольствия".

languages.text: "And this brings us to our main issue... Footfall is a repair shipyard and a trading post — we barely produce anything ourselves and are largely dependent on incoming shipments. Especially food shipments. The station, naturally, has some reserves, but the supply issues didn't start yesterday. Footfall would be obliged if House von Valancius would assist us by signing a contract for food deliveries."
languages.original_text: "И это приводит нас к главной проблеме... Футфол — ремонтная верфь и место торговли, сами мы почти ничего не производим и сильно зависим от внешних поставок. Особенно — поставок продовольствия. Станция, разумеется, имеет запасы, но проблемы с маршрутами начались не вчера. Футфол будет признателен, если династия фон Валанциус окажет нам помощь и заключит договор на поставку продовольствия".

Especially food shipments. The station, naturally, has some reserves, but the supply issues didn't start yesterday. Footfall would be obliged if House von Valancius would assist us by signing a contract for food deliveries."

Especially food shipments. The station, naturally, has some reserves, but the supply issues didn't start yesterday. Footfall would be obliged if House von Valancius would assist us by signing a contract for food deliveries."

Especially food shipments. The station, naturally, has some reserves, but the supply issues didn't start yesterday. Footfall would be obliged if House von Valancius would assist us by signing a contract for food deliveries."

languages.text: 「そして、ここからが本題なのだが…フットフォールは修理を担当する造船所であり交易所だ。自分達で生産しているものはほとんどなく、主に輸入に頼っている。特に食糧は頼りっきりだ。ステーションには当然いくらか備蓄があるものの、供給の問題は昨日今日に始まったことではない。フォン・ヴァランシウス家が食糧配達の契約に署名して私達を支援してくれれば、フットフォールは大いに感謝しよう」
languages.original_text: "And this brings us to our main issue... Footfall is a repair shipyard and a trading post — we barely produce anything ourselves and are largely dependent on incoming shipments. Especially food shipments. The station, naturally, has some reserves, but the supply issues didn't start yesterday. Footfall would be obliged if House von Valancius would assist us by signing a contract for food deliveries."

traits.locale_text: 「そして、ここからが本題なのだが…フットフォールは修理を担当する造船所であり交易所だ。自分達で生産しているものはほとんどなく、主に輸入に頼っている。特に食糧は頼りっきりだ。ステーションには当然いくらか備蓄があるものの、供給の問題は昨日今日に始まったことではない。フォン・ヴァランシウス家が食糧配達の契約に署名して私達を支援してくれれば、フットフォールは大いに感謝しよう」

languages.text: “既然如此，我们就要讨论最主要的问题了……落脚港是一座修船厂兼贸易站。我们自己基本什么东西都不生产，很大程度上依赖进口货物，尤其是食物。当然，星站有一部分食物储备，但供给问题并不是昨天才出现的。如果冯·瓦兰修斯家族能帮助我们，签订一份食物运输合同，我们将不胜感激。”
languages.original_text: "And this brings us to our main issue... Footfall is a repair shipyard and a trading post — we barely produce anything ourselves and are largely dependent on incoming shipments. Especially food shipments. The station, naturally, has some reserves, but the supply issues didn't start yesterday. Footfall would be obliged if House von Valancius would assist us by signing a contract for food deliveries."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，我们就要讨论最主要的问题了……落脚港是一座修船厂兼贸易站。我们自己基本什么东西都不生产，很大程度上依赖进口货物，尤其是食物。当然，星站有一部分食物储备，但供给问题并不是昨天才出现的。如果冯·瓦兰修斯家族能帮助我们，签订一份食物运输合同，我们将不胜感激。”

languages.text: «Y ello nos lleva a nuestro problema principal... Paso es un astillero de reparaciones y un puesto comercial. No producimos apenas nada por nuestra cuenta y dependemos en gran medida de los cargamentos que nos llegan; sobre todo los de alimentos. La estación, por supuesto, retiene ciertas reservas, pero llevamos ya un tiempo adoleciendo de suministros. Paso le estaría agradecida a la casa von Valancius si nos ayudara firmando un contrato para el suministro de alimentos».
languages.original_text: "And this brings us to our main issue... Footfall is a repair shipyard and a trading post — we barely produce anything ourselves and are largely dependent on incoming shipments. Especially food shipments. The station, naturally, has some reserves, but the supply issues didn't start yesterday. Footfall would be obliged if House von Valancius would assist us by signing a contract for food deliveries."

traits.locale_text: «Y ello nos lleva a nuestro problema principal... Paso es un astillero de reparaciones y un puesto comercial. No producimos apenas nada por nuestra cuenta y dependemos en gran medida de los cargamentos que nos llegan; sobre todo los de alimentos. La estación, por supuesto, retiene ciertas reservas, pero llevamos ya un tiempo adoleciendo de suministros. Paso le estaría agradecida a la casa von Valancius si nos ayudara firmando un contrato para el suministro de alimentos».

languages.text: « Ce qui nous amène à notre problème principal... Castel est un chantier de réparations et un comptoir commercial , nous ne produisons quasiment rien nous-mêmes et dépendons presque entièrement de l'importation, particulièrement en matière de nourriture. Bien entendu, la station a quelques réserves, mais nos problèmes d'approvisionnement ne datent pas d'hier. Nous serions très reconnaissants envers la maison von Valancius si celle-ci voulait bien nous aider en signant un contrat de livraisons alimentaires. »
languages.original_text: "And this brings us to our main issue... Footfall is a repair shipyard and a trading post — we barely produce anything ourselves and are largely dependent on incoming shipments. Especially food shipments. The station, naturally, has some reserves, but the supply issues didn't start yesterday. Footfall would be obliged if House von Valancius would assist us by signing a contract for food deliveries."

traits.locale_text: « Ce qui nous amène à notre problème principal... Castel est un chantier de réparations et un comptoir commercial , nous ne produisons quasiment rien nous-mêmes et dépendons presque entièrement de l'importation, particulièrement en matière de nourriture. Bien entendu, la station a quelques réserves, mais nos problèmes d'approvisionnement ne datent pas d'hier. Nous serions très reconnaissants envers la maison von Valancius si celle-ci voulait bien nous aider en signant un contrat de livraisons alimentaires. »

languages.text: "Und das bringt uns zu unserem Hauptproblem ... Footfall ist eine Schiffsreparaturwerft und ein Handelsposten – wir produzieren praktisch nichts selbst und sind stark abhängig von eintreffenden Lieferungen. Vor allem Lebensmittel. Natürlich hat die Station Reserven, aber die Versorgungsprobleme begannen ja nicht erst gestern. Footfall wäre dem Haus von Valancius sehr zu Dank verpflichtet, wenn Ihr für uns einen Vertrag über Lebensmittellieferungen unterschreiben würdet."
languages.original_text: "And this brings us to our main issue... Footfall is a repair shipyard and a trading post — we barely produce anything ourselves and are largely dependent on incoming shipments. Especially food shipments. The station, naturally, has some reserves, but the supply issues didn't start yesterday. Footfall would be obliged if House von Valancius would assist us by signing a contract for food deliveries."

traits.locale_text: "Und das bringt uns zu unserem Hauptproblem ... Footfall ist eine Schiffsreparaturwerft und ein Handelsposten – wir produzieren praktisch nichts selbst und sind stark abhängig von eintreffenden Lieferungen. Vor allem Lebensmittel. Natürlich hat die Station Reserven, aber die Versorgungsprobleme begannen ja nicht erst gestern. Footfall wäre dem Haus von Valancius sehr zu Dank verpflichtet, wenn Ihr für uns einen Vertrag über Lebensmittellieferungen unterschreiben würdet."

languages.text: "Bu da bizi asıl meselemize getiriyor: Binliman bir onarım tersanesi ve bir ticaret merkezidir. Neredeyse hiçbir şeyi kendimiz üretmediğimizden büyük ölçüde gelen sevkiyatlara, özellikle de gıda sevkiyatlarına bağımlıyız. Pek tabii istasyonun birtakım rezervleri var ama tedarik sorunları da dün başlamadı. Von Valancius Hanesi, yiyecek teslimatları için bir sözleşme imzalayarak bize yardım ederse Binliman minnettar kalır."
languages.original_text: "And this brings us to our main issue... Footfall is a repair shipyard and a trading post — we barely produce anything ourselves and are largely dependent on incoming shipments. Especially food shipments. The station, naturally, has some reserves, but the supply issues didn't start yesterday. Footfall would be obliged if House von Valancius would assist us by signing a contract for food deliveries."

traits.locale_text: "Bu da bizi asıl meselemize getiriyor: Binliman bir onarım tersanesi ve bir ticaret merkezidir, neredeyse hiçbir şeyi kendimiz üretmediğimizden büyük ölçüde gelen sevkiyatlara, özellikle de gıda sevkiyatlarına bağımlıyız. İstasyonun birtakım rezervleri var pek tabii ama tedarik sorunları da dün başlamadı. Von Valancius Hanesi, yiyecek teslimatları için bir sözleşme imzalayarak bize yardım ederse Binliman minnettar kalacaktır."
